description: This file defines asynchronous service functions for managing test cases in a database, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting test cases.

methods.name: List[models.TestCase] list_testcases(db: AsyncSession)
methods.description: Lists all test cases ordered by creation date descending.

methods.name: Optional[models.TestCase] get_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a single test case by its ID.

methods.name: models.TestCase create_testcase(db: AsyncSession, data: TestCaseCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new test case with provided data.

methods.name: Optional[models.TestCase] update_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int, data: TestCaseUpdate)
methods.description: Updates an existing test case identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: bool delete_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a test case by ID, also removing associations in related tables.

ctags.name: create_testcase
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_testcase(db: AsyncSession, data: TestCaseCreate) -> models.TestCase:$/

ctags.name: delete_testcase
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int) -> bool:$/

ctags.name: get_testcase
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int) -> Optional[models.TestCase]:$/

ctags.name: update_testcase
ctags.pattern: /^async def update_testcase(db: AsyncSession, testcase_id: int, data: TestCaseUpdate) -> Optional[/
